00033 using namespace std;
00034 using namespace birdseed::dev;
00035 
00036 static void setCluster(Clusters *clusters, const char *strCluster, size_t i)
00037 {
00038     double covar;
00039     int ret = sscanf(strCluster, "%lf %lf %lf %lf %lf %lf",
00040                      &clusters->means[i][0], &clusters->means[i][1], &clusters->vars[i][0], &covar, &clusters->vars[i][1], &clusters->weights[i]);
00041     if (ret != 6) {
00042         throw BroadException("Error parsing cluster", __FILE__, __LINE__, strCluster);
00043     }
00044     clusters->covar = covar / sqrt(clusters->vars[i][0] * clusters->vars[i][1]);
00045 }
00046 
00047 /**
00048  * Because clusters get filled in backward, if a haploid set is read, the two clusters
00049  * must be slid down.
00050  */
00051 static void slideClustersDown(Clusters *clusters)
00052 {
00053     assert(clusters->k == 2);
00054     for (size_t i = 0; i < 2; ++i) {
00055         clusters->means[i] = clusters->means[i+1];
00056         clusters->vars[i] = clusters->vars[i+1];
00057         clusters->weights[i] = clusters->weights[i+1];
00058     }
00059     clusters->means.resize(2);
00060     clusters->vars.resize(2);
00061     clusters->weights.resize(2);
00062 }
00063 
00064 TextClustersReader::TextClustersReader(const std::string& textPath)
00065 {
00066   FILE *fp = fopen_check(textPath.c_str(), "r");
00067     char buf[10000];
00068     while (fgets(buf, sizeof(buf), fp) != NULL) {
00069         if (strlen(buf) >= sizeof(buf) - 1) {
00070           throw BroadException("Line too long in text clusters file.", __FILE__, __LINE__, textPath.c_str());
00071         }
00072         const char *name = strtok(buf, ";");
00073         if (name == NULL) {
00074           throw BroadException("Error parsing text clusters file.",  __FILE__, __LINE__, textPath.c_str());
00075         }
00076         Clusters clusters(1, MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS, 0);
00077         // Finny produces priors in the reverse order of what Josh expects.
00078         for (int i = MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
00079             const char *clusterString = strtok(NULL, ";");
00080             if (clusterString == NULL) {
00081                 if (i == 0) {
00082                     clusters.k = 2;
00083                     slideClustersDown(&clusters);
00084                     break;
00085                 }
00086                 throw BroadException("Error parsing text clusters file.",  __FILE__, __LINE__, textPath.c_str());
00087             }
00088             
00089             setCluster(&clusters, clusterString, i);
00090         }
00091         if (!clustersMap.insert(ClustersMap::value_type(name, clusters)).second) {
00092             throw BroadException("Cluster seen more than once text clusters file.",  __FILE__, __LINE__, name);
00093         }
00094     }
00095     if (ferror(fp)) {
00096       throw BroadException("Error reading text clusters file.", __FILE__, __LINE__, textPath.c_str(), errno);
00097     }
00098     fclose(fp);
00099 }
00100 
00101 const Clusters *TextClustersReader::getPrior(const std::string& clusterName)
00102 {
00103   ClustersMap::const_iterator it = clustersMap.find(clusterName);
00104     if (it == clustersMap.end()) {
00105         Verbose::warn(2, std::string("Could not find cluster in text clusters file: ") + clusterName);
00106         return NULL;
00107     }
00108     return &(*it).second;
00109 }
